TopicTitle: UV map wont apply to model?

Articles.Content:
I made a mesh, applied materials to some of the faces, & then UV unwrapped it. 

See here:

https://imgur.com/a/wovZ1tC

 

But the UV map won't apply to the model? It just keeps the textures from the materials I applied earlier.

Please help, I cant figure out what to do now.
Problem solved; weird issue with my install
